name: Chivalry: Medieval Warfare
blurb: Besiege castles and raid villages in Chivalry: Medieval Warfare, a fast-paced medieval FPS (Slasher with a Multi-player online focus)

rewards.reward: Thank you! Exclusive wallpaper of the game + Your name on our website as a kickstarter supporter, included in all higher tiers
Ready for Battle Edition -\t\r\nA digital copy of the game.
Symphony of Death and Destruction Edition -\r\nA Digital Copy of the game + Digital copy of the Original Sound Track
Sign me up for Beta Edition -\t\r\nEarly Access to the game + Exclusive media reveals+ A Digital Copy of the game+ A digital copy of the OST
Collectors Edition - \r\nAll previous rewards + Retail Copy of the Game (Please include $10 for shipping)
Brothers in Arms Edition -\r\nFour digital copies of the game + OST + Early access to the game + Exclusive media reveals

Mason Warrior Edition -\t\r\nMason supporter T-shirt + Your name in the game credits as Mason supporter +digital copy of the game + OST + Early Access to the game + Exclusive media reveals (Please add $15 for shipping)

Agathian Knight Edition -\r\nAgatha supporter T-shirt + Your name in the game credits as an Agathian supporter + digital copy of the game + OST + Early Access to the game + Exclusive media reveals (Please add $15 for shipping)

Prestige Edition -\r\nExclusive Ingame Helmet + your name in the game credits as a warrior of prestige + Agatha or Mason supporter T-shirt + digital copy of the game + OST + Early Access to the game + Exclusive media reveals (Please add $15 for shipping)
Well Endowed Edition -\r\nAll previous rewards + Too Big Sword T-shirt + Your name in the game credits as a double fisted supporter, includes retail copy of the game (Please add $15 for shipping)

Chivalry Fanboy Edition -\r\nAll previous rewards + A Hi-rez Movie Poster[24x36 Inches] of the game + Your name in the game credits as a Chivalry Fanboy, Includes retail copy of the game (Please add $20 for shipping)

The Art of Death Edition -\r\nAll previous rewards + Signed artwork from our Concept Artist (Richard Yang) + Your name in the game credits as a Chivalry Fanboy, Includes retail copy of the game (please add $20 for shipping)

Sir Nameabot Edition -\r\nAll previous rewards + Name one of the Bots in the game (Subject to approval, must not be profane or obscure) + Your name in the game credits as a Chivalry Fanboy, includes retail copy of the game (please add $20 for shipping)

Knights of the Torn Banner Edition - \r\nAll previous rewards + Every game and all DLC Torn Banner Studios ever makes for free + Your name in the game credits of every game we ever make as a Lifetime Supporter and Knight of the Torn Banner, includes retail copy of the game (We'll cover all shipping)

Legendary Hero Edition -\r\nAll inclusive. Get all T-shirt options, all Poster options, Art from Richard Yang, name a bot and every game and all DLC we ever make for free + credit in the game as a Hero of the Torn Banner and Life time supporter + A handwritten thank you scroll from the developers. Includes signed retail copy of the game (We'll cover all shipping)

Immortal Edition \u2013\r\nAll previous rewards + Commissioned Art by Richard Yang, you describe a battle scene or moment that you want designed specifically for you (can feature you defeating your friend on the battlefield or you rescuing your loved one etc.) and our artist will create it exclusively for you. (Must be Chivalry or Medieval era related) Includes signed retail copy of the game (We'll cover all shipping)
